name: Aquatic adventure demo version
description:
Hi everyone! Joe, the main character from Aquatic adventure here! Your favourite underwater survival game is now available as a demo. It's free! Come join me as we have fun in this limited miniworld based on the full game! Build, break, do whatever you want! It's up to you! I hope to see you in the full version! See ya!

This is the Aquatic adventure demo version. This version has many similarities to the full edition but has limited resources. This demo hasn't got infinite terrain, random terrain or the ability to kill sea creatures, but this should give you an idea how fun the full version can be! Building materials include sand, sandstone, stone and seaweed.

Check out the full version here: https://cybrog.itch.io/aquatic-adventure
